title: Comic Cons
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,398 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 990L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Z1 and Z2
description: Fans of pop culture love the colorful and crowded worlds discovered at comic conventions. Comic Cons provides students with a detailed look at these gatherings of comic enthusiasts. The book can also be used to teach students how to distinguish between fact and opinion and use plural nouns. The book and lesson are also available for levels Z1 and Z2.

Fact or Opinion : Determine whether a detail is a fact or an opinion
